title: MC服务器主菜单设置用物品打开，但是打不开高价悬赏
author: woshinidemama6
txt_content:
帮我解决一下问题！高价悬赏！！！设置的用物品打开 却打不开大神帮忙解决一下
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '服务器菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 6

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'menu'


  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

replies.author: 倾城丶小梦
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: woshinidemama6
replies.txt_content: 权限组叫什么名字，具体怎么操作呢
